tldr: In this letter, Christopher Hunter shares Roman inscriptions found near Durham, which he believes to be the Longovicum of the Romans. He discusses the possible locations of public buildings and the possibility that the "Balneum cum Basilica" mentioned in one of the inscriptions could be a long-lost structure in Rome. Hunter also mentions the discovery of an earthen urn and his plans to share more information about the area in the future.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Archaeology
